CustomField.description: If checked, allows Admin to make 'global' changes to the Misc Adj., including edits to the Misc Adj.'s Project, Resource, Currency, or Date, even if Include In Financials is checked. Config requirement: Actuals Calculation Mode must be set to 'Scheduled'.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, allows Admin to make 'global' changes to the Misc Adj., including edits to the Misc Adj.'s Project, Resource, Currency, or Date, even if Include In Financials is checked. Config requirement: Actuals Calculation Mode must be set to 'Scheduled'.
CustomField.label: Admin Global Edit
